page.title: 05A QUESTIONAIRE PART 2
page.content: This is the second part of a questionaire about shops in Six Bells. {8.Do you own any other shops No. {9.Does the shop open every Sunday? Yes. {10.How long have you worked in this {shop? Two years. {11.Is there another job you would like {to do? No. {12.Do customers ever complain? Sometimes. {13.Do you often have things stolen? Yes. {14.Has the shop ever been broken into? Yes. {15.What changes would you like to see {to shops in this area? I would like more zebra crossings on the road.
